Package PickupPointSystem.DatabaseSystem

Class PersistenceFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • PickupPointSystem.DatabaseSystem.PersistenceFacade
  • public class PersistenceFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an interface between the mappers and the other classes that need to use them
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrea Stella
